Html: I have two WPF DataGrids.  I want to allow the user to drag the contents of a cell (DataGridComboBoxColumn selected value) in one DataGrid and drop it into the other DataGrid.  Does anyone have any examples or suggestions on how this can be done?  Thank you,

Hi,

 

I was able to implement the drag/drop functionality between two DataGrids by following the instructions in this post.  I had to make a few changes, but the article did a good job explaining how to implement drag/drop between WPF components.

 

http://www.wpftutorial.net/DragAndDrop.html

 

 

Also, I set the grid to single-click editing per the instructions found in the DataGrip Tips and Tricks

http://wpf.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Single-Click%20Editing&referringTitle=Tips%20%26%20Tricks

 

Thank you,
